Networking Project

This is a deep dive into the networking project i completed for university.

Description

For this module i had to create a application that successfully sent packages between them. I chose to create a very basic game on a client to server infrastructure. Two playable clients and a server with a GUI to display the results were used. The clients were identical just run multiple times.
